column5: Well we all heard the good news.  My question is when the leafs win the cup this year will it really count cause its not a full season.  I go with yes cause a cup is a cup and a full regular season or half season I will be crying in front of my TV when they lift the cup.  Discuss

Shaky goaltending, young unexpierenced D-man, Lupol will have a hard time living up to what he did last year.. IMO they'll be lucky if they make playoffs Although.. they usually do play well.. for half a season!
I just looked out the window and there were a whole bunch of pigs flying just over the treetops! Discuss.
Ya those pigs are flying to the ACC to watch those leafs win another cup.lol
28-18-3 sounds pretty good.  They wont be at the top, but as longs as Reimer is hopefully back to his old self then there is a good chance there getting home ice advantage in the first round.

There is no first half now,I think It will be tough{what did they do in the off season},remind me if I forgot something,lol.Every team I believe will come out full tilt,so I would expect a tough go.imo. Go Leafs Go!!!!!
Only cup leafs will be lifting is the coffee cup at the club house before tee off as they don't make the playoffs once again. Go Bruins Go lol

With the goaltending situation in Toronto the way it is, it will be nice to see them win a game never mind the cup.  Riemer and Scrivens are a real 1-2 punch.  What's that, Luongo you say?  Yeah, that'll help

There is going to be a lot of moves made, 2 player buyout per team will open up a fair bit of talent. Lou still on the block. We will see. I am going to reserve judgement until we see what team will hit the ice.
